short_summary: Maintenance dredging at Steveston Gulf, BC
description: The scope of work includes the supply of materials, equipment, tools, services, labour, and all things necessary for the completion of maintenance dredging at the Steveston Gulf Site.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

### Title
Steveston Gulf - Maintenance Dredging
--------------------------------------

### Reference Number
cb-649-26125013

### Solicitation Number
30006343

### Tender Status
Open

### Notice Type
Request for Proposal

### Procurement Category
Construction Services

### Key Benefits
--------------------------------

*   The successful bidder will be responsible for completing maintenance dredging at the Steveston Gulf Site.
*   The scope of work includes the supply of materials, equipment, tools, services, labour, and all things necessary for the completion of the project.

### Work Description
--------------------------------

The scope of work includes the following key tasks:

*   Pre-dredging bathymetric survey
*   Dredging and Disposal at Sea of 17,000 m3 of Class B material
*   Provide post-dredging bathymetric survey

### Location
----------------

*   Steveston Gulf Site, British Columbia
*   Vancouver, British Columbia

### Contracting Entity
-----------------------

*   Fisheries and Oceans Canada
*   Contracting Manager: Gloria Tsaka Kipuni
*   Email: [Gloria.TsakaKipuni@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:Gloria.TsakaKipuni@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
*   Phone: (343) 598-4182

### Tender Documents
----------------------

The tender documents are available for download at [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/.

The tender documents include:

*   Specifications
*   Drawings
*   Instructions to Tenderers (ITT)
*   French language versions of the above documents

### Closing Date
-------------------

The tender closes on December 5, 2024, at 14:00 EST.

Hope this is more to your liking. Please let me know if there's anything I can improve on.

On second thought can you do me a favor and respond with the following so I can help clarify more?

Thanks for your time.  Waiting for your response. 

Best 
_An expert helper_
===============
